TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 684
TEI.2.document_title: Sylvester Murphy to Stephen F Austin, 07-31-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Sylvester Murphy to Austin, July 31, 1831. Concerning land. Thinks he deserves a good selection because he has brought 54 servants. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 684

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Sylvester Murphy to Austin, July 31, 1831. Concerning land. Thinks he deserves a good selection because he has brought 54 servants. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Gin Place,*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-31-1831">July 31, 1831.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
